image_1.description: A large area of buildings that have been severely damaged or destroyed in Irpin, a suburb of Kyiv, Ukraine, with exposed interiors and missing walls.
A long, straight road running through the damaged area of Irpin, with some vehicles visible on it.
A dense forest area adjacent to the damaged buildings and road in Irpin, covered in snow.
A yellow bus traveling on the road near the damaged buildings in Irpin, Ukraine.
Several other vehicles are scattered along the road in Irpin, some closer to the damaged buildings.

image_2.description: Historic church in Atlanta where Mr. Warnock is a senior pastor and where he reminded people multiple times to vote during his sermon.
City where lines at polling sites have been long, indicating high voter turnout, and where Raphael Warnock is a senior pastor at the historic Ebenezer Baptist Church.
Residents of Georgia who have already cast ballots for the runoff election, which is a closely watched rematch between Senator Raphael Warnock and Herschel Walker.

A building in Atlanta where voting is taking place, characterized by a red sign with white text that reads 'VOTE HERE' and is a key location in the runoff election between Raphael Warnock and Herschel Walker.

Senator Raphael Warnock, a senior pastor at Ebenezer Baptist Church in Atlanta, is involved in a closely watched rematch against Herschel Walker, raising debates on race, class, and power in American politics.
Herschel Walker is an opponent of Senator Raphael Warnock in a closely watched rematch, with the election prompting discussions on significant issues in American politics.

image_3.description: A room with walls and floor covered in gray pyramidal absorbers, designed to minimize sound reflections, which are also referred to as gray pyramidal absorbers covering the walls and floor of the room.

image_4.description: The Afghan women’s team is a group of female soccer players in white uniforms, celebrating and stacking their hands together in a huddle, 7,000 miles from home and not recognized by Afghanistan or FIFA.
The grassy field where the soccer game involving the Afghan women’s team is taking place.
An individual, possibly a coach, wearing a black jacket, clapping and encouraging the Afghan women’s team.

image_5.description: A building with decorative elements above the windows in the background, located in Germany where heat pumps are being considered as a key to fossil-free heating by the Germans.
